title: Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform Performance Considerations for Operator Based Installations
subtitle: This guide provides recommendations on how to configure Automation Controller and Container Groups resource requests and other kubernetes configuration options to more efficiently run jobs at scale on operator based installations of Automation Controller.

abstract.para: If you have a suggestion to improve this documentation, or find an error, please contact technical support at to create an issue on the Ansible Automation Platform Jira project using the Docs component.
